snippet: Islanders defenseman Lubomir Visnovsky, who returned recently from a concussion, said he was not healthy enough to play for Slovakia in the Olympics.
abstract: New York Islanders defenseman Lubomir Visnovsky, who returned recently from a concussion, will not skate for Slovakia at the Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia.
lead_paragraph: Islanders defenseman Lubomir Visnovsky, who returned recently from a concussion, said he was not healthy enough to play for Slovakia in the Olympics.

headline.main: An Islander Plays on Saturday, but Won’t in Sochi
headline.print_headline: An Islander Plays on Saturday, but Won’t in Sochi
